scripts.build: react-scripts build && yarn run copy_js && yarn run copy_css
scripts.copy_js: cp build/static/js/2.*.chunk.js ../wordpress/wp-content/themes/ies/js/2.chunk.js && cp build/static/js/main.*.chunk.js ../wordpress/wp-content/themes/ies/js/main.chunk.js && cp build/static/js/runtime~main.*.js ../wordpress/wp-content/themes/ies/js/runtime~main.js
scripts.build:custom: yarn run build && yarn run copy_js && yarn run copy_css
